item.title: 'Really hard to take': How resilient Pie bounced back after September cut
item.description: John Noble was brutally dropped ahead of Collingwood's run to a premiership last season, but he's back in a big way after putting his head down over the summer to earn his spot back in the Magpies' side

item.title: Port guns stake claim, but trio isn't ranked No.1
item.description: Port Adelaide's trio staked their claim as the League's best midfield, but they aren't ranked No.1 in 2024

item.title: 15 and zip: Remarkable stat highlights Taylor's dominance
item.description: Sam Taylor has been involved in 15 contested defensive one-on-ones this season and he is yet to lose one

item.title: The lessons Freo took from loss, Clark receives support
item.description: The Dockers are confident they will learn from their defeat to the Blues as the season goes on

item.title: Dogs' son of a gun lands Rising Star nomination
item.description: Sam Darcy has been named the Rising Star for round four

item.title: AFL dismisses Clarkson comparison as Finlayson verdict looms
item.description: The AFL has not yet confirmed a punishment for Jeremy Finlayson after the Port Adelaide forward directed a homophobic slur to an opponent during round four
